reviews.name: Garry Myers
reviews.text: Excellent prices and customer service. Portajohns were also very clean and well maintained. Great business

reviews.name: Philip Marty
reviews.text: Zach is very responsive and friendly, porta potties are clean and work well. Highly recommend

reviews.name: Barbara
reviews.text: I am so very impressed with the service I receive from Sit & Git Portables.  Zach is very efficient at his job, always there when service is needed and an all around really nice person.  I will gladly continue working with this company.

reviews.name: Aaron Monson
reviews.text: We rented 10 restrooms from Sit & Git when we were in a pinch for an event. Zach got us taken care of in a timely fashion with some clean restrooms!
